attributes.action: Stop Natalie Goldring moving away from her friends
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As friends of Natalie Goldring we request that she can not move too far away from her friends.  Lets keep her close to us and we cant possibly let her move to squaddie land in Aldershot (unless Stevo is joining the army)

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
